sentence: Consumer shares were mixed ahead of the opening bell Tuesday.
In consumer stocks news, Dick's Sporting Goods Inc ( DKS ) said Tuesday that it has named Paul Gaffney as its new chief technology officer, effective November 20.
Gaffney joins the company from Home Depot ( HD ), where he served as senior vice president of information technology.
Shares in the company were 5.5% lower at $24.85 pre-bell.
The stock has traded between $23.88 and $62.80 over the past 52 weeks.
